scripts.version-patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run tag
scripts.version-patch-mac: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run tag-mac
scripts.version-minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run tag
scripts.version-minor-mac: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run tag-mac
scripts.version-major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run tag
scripts.version-major-mac: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run tag-mac
scripts.tag: node build/version.mjs && git add web/package.json package.json && git commit -m "v%npm_package_version%" && git tag -m "v%npm_package_version%" "v%npm_package_version%" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.tag-mac: node build/version.mjs && git add web/package.json package.json && git commit -m "v${npm_package_version}" && git tag -m "v${npm_package_version}" "v${npm_package_version}" && git push --follow-tags
